function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shedding of SARS-CoV-2 virus in wastewater","Impact":"Monitoring the prevalence of infections among the population via wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE)","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and analysis of wastewater for SARS-CoV-2 virus presence","Technologies":"Reverse transcriptase quantitative polymerase chain reaction (RT-qPCR) for viral RNA enumeration","People":"Population in the catchment area","Owner":"Public health authorities and wastewater treatment plant administrators"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in estimating the number of infected individuals from wastewater viral RNA copy numbers","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of the number of infected individuals in the catchment area","Mitigation":"Improvement of input parameter accuracy and reliability, utilization of advanced modeling techniques","Technologies":"Monte Carlo simulation for estimation, advanced statistical modeling techniques","People":"Research team, public health authorities","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater and potential exposure to the virus during wastewater handling","Impact":"Risk of infection for individuals involved in wastewater handling and treatment","Mitigation":"Implementation of personal protective equipment (PPE) protocols for wastewater workers, regular testing and monitoring of wastewater treatment plant staff","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment (PPE), regular testing and monitoring protocols","People":"Wastewater treatment plant workers","Owner":"Wastewater treatment plant administrators"}]}
